snippet: KOOPER--Jean. April 18 in Manhattan, at age 90. Beloved mother of Fae Hamilton and Jim, Larry Kooper and Mary Beth, grandmother of Max Kooper, sister of Rosalind Kresky. Beloved wife of the late Al Kooper. She was an elementary school teacher, amateur painter and sculptor, and was active in Jewish organizations. She enjoyed many close friendships, was an avid reader and crossword puzzler, and loved music and singing. Contributions may be sent to CurePSP.org. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KOOPER--Jean. April 18 in Manhattan, at age 90. Beloved mother of Fae Hamilton and Jim, Larry Kooper and Mary Beth, grandmother of Max Kooper, sister of Rosalind Kresky. Beloved wife of the late Al Kooper. She was an elementary school teacher, amateur painter and sculptor, and was active in Jewish organizations. She enjoyed many close friendships, was an avid reader and crossword puzzler, and loved music and singing. Contributions may be sent to CurePSP.org. 1/3
